title: Unicode Text Displayed as numbers
body:
I have a web application developed using JSF, JPA & MySQL. I recently moved the database and GlassFish server to a new machine. Initially there was text in a field labeled as @Lob, but now they are displayed as series of numbers.

For example, initially a text displayed as bbb, now displayed as 656565.

I didn't change any configuration of JSF or JPA.

How can I get data in mySQL database as text again.

@Lob
String diagnosis;
